meanings.sent1: During midsummer, the sun shines brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: We always have a picnic in the park during midsummer.
meanings.sent3: At midsummer, the ice cream truck seems to be the busiest.
meanings.sent4: The energy of midsummer fills the air with warmth and joy.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloom beautifully during midsummer.

meanings.definition: The period of time around the middle of summer.
meanings.sent1: Midsummer is a time when we enjoy long days and warm nights.
meanings.sent2: Many people go on vacation during midsummer.
meanings.sent3: The neighborhood pool is always crowded at midsummer.
meanings.sent4: In the hustle and bustle of midsummer, time seems to slow down.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of midsummer is contagious among friends and family.
